puzzles.title: Candy Code
puzzles.question:
I’m not alive, but I can grow.
I don’t have eyes, but I can glow.
I’m made in a pot, but not from a seed. What am I?
puzzles.hint: Spun, not grown. Melts on your tongue.

puzzles.title: Muffin Mix-Up
puzzles.question:
If two muffins take 20 minutes to bake,
how long would eight muffins take in the same oven?
puzzles.hint: They all bake together — not one after the other!

puzzles.title: Tart Tray Trick
puzzles.question:
Which one of these does not belong in a bakery?

A) Whisk
B) Rolling Pin
C) Toaster
D) Measuring Cups
puzzles.hint: The others help with baking — not toasting.

puzzles.title: Sugarplum Switch
puzzles.question:
What comes in a cone but isn’t an ice cream,
melts with heat and sparkles with gleam?
puzzles.hint: You may find it growing on a stick.

puzzles.title: Frosting Riddle
puzzles.question:
I can be whipped, piped, or spread.
I sit on top, but I’m not the bread. What am I?
puzzles.hint: The prettiest part of a cake!

puzzles.title: Sprinkle Lock
puzzles.question:
You need the code to unlock the sprinkle jar.
Clue: The code is the number of legs on:
– 1 gingerbread man
– 1 cake stand
– 2 stools
puzzles.hint: Count only what’s on the floor!
